template.name: ExampleCFI_isInvalid

transition.label: t == 1 && faultAt > globalClock
osp_dec(2), osp_inc(), os[osp - 1] = os[osp - 1] + os[osp], t = 0

template.name: ExampleCFI_ExampleCFI

transition.label: t == 1 && !ifcmpeq() && faultAt > globalClock
opstack_fault = osp < 2 ? true : opstack_fault, osp_dec(2), t = 0

template.name: ExampleCFI_processVerifyPIN

transition.label: t == 1 && faultAt > globalClock
osp_dec(2), osp_inc(), os[osp - 1] = os[osp - 1] + os[osp], t = 0
t == 1 && !ifeq() && faultAt > globalClock
opstack_fault = osp < 1 ? true : opstack_fault, osp_dec(1), t = 0

template.name: ExampleCFI_main
ExampleCFI_getTriesRemaining
ExampleCFI_setIncomingAndReceive

transition.label: t == 1 && faultAt > globalClock
osp_dec(2), osp_inc(), os[osp - 1] = os[osp - 1] + os[osp], t = 0

query.formula: Pr[<= 100] (<> opstack_fault || iExampleCFI_isInvalid.error || iExampleCFI_ExampleCFI.error || iExampleCFI_processVerifyPIN.error || iExampleCFI_main.error || iExampleCFI_getTriesRemaining.error || iExampleCFI_setIncomingAndReceive.error)
